views.markdown:
- New: Added option for dark recipient bar - Improved memory usage - Rewrote "Show Pin Image" feature to prevent it from overriding the unread indicator - Fixed potential crash when deleting conversations

- Fixed crash that occurred when "filter unknown senders" was enabled

- Fixed startup crash on iOS 8 and below (thanks for testing, Alex!)

- New: Added option for light status bar
- New: Added option for dark group members bar
- New: Added option for dark message entry bar
- New: Added image to indicate pinned conversation
- New: Added ability to clear pinned/hidden convos
- New: Added simulated vibe for non 6s devices
- Fixed issue where pinned convos would stay pinned after feature was disabled
- Fixed issue where hidden convos would stay hidden after feature was disabled
- Improved mark read/unread feature
- Optimizations and bug fixes
- Code cleanup
